item.description: As of July 2019 I am a PostDoc at the International Conflict Research Group at ETH Zurich and a visiting researcher at Harvard University’s Institute for Quantitative Social Science. My recently finished dissertation focuses on state building in twentieth century Africa and its effects on local development and conflict. At ETH Zurich, I am part of the ERC NASTAC project that analyzes the interplay between nationalism and state (trans)formation in Europe.
